collectible.title: Tomoko's Panties
collectible.subtitle: Very Unpopular
collectible.text: A pair of rather damp panties. You should probably wash these.

collectible.title: Tomoko's Tanktop
collectible.subtitle: It's not a tanktop!
collectible.text: While a tanktop would be comfortable for those with small breasts, it's still not that. It's just a long bra, okay?
collectible.unlock: Make Tomoko lesbian. (HINT: Play as female.)
